snippet.title: Project: AHNO's Ark PV
snippet.description:
Welcome to add to the wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631670/

Tactical RPG + Go elements + Roguelite = "Project: AHNO's Ark". 

This is a distinctive Japanese tactical RPG game where, besides using regular attacks and skill cards to defeat enemies, you can also eliminate them directly by surrounding them! Different mission choices and a plethora of branching paths will significantly alter the course of the story and character narratives. The 6x6 combat chessboard introduces a faster combat pace unlike traditional tactical RPGs, and the vast array of skill choices and character leveling system offer players a high degree of freedom. Players will need to make decisions amidst numerous random events and skill divergences, striving to survive in an apocalyptic game of mutual destruction... Construct your own team, and save everyone from the end-of-the-world mayhem!
